This is now playing activity, this activity will be responsible for showing the song that is currently running ! :)... "MediaController" is the class that will be used to control options like play/pause, rewind, fast forward and a progress slidebar

Here Google Payment API will be used
 The Google Payment API facilitates fast and easy online purchases for users, and eliminates manual entry of payment and shipping information..sounds awesome :D
 Few steps:
 	 Install and add a payment method to Android Pay
 	 Add a payment method to Google
 	 Configure the project to add dependencies
 	 In AndroidManifest.xml file need to enable Google Payment API
 	 by setting value to true
